segments.source_content: This week, I've been looking at the release of Lit 3.0 to see if the use of Web Components has become easier with React.

translations.zh-hant: 本週，我一直在關注 Lit 3.0 的發布，看看在 React 中使用 Web Components 是否變得更容易。

segments.source_content: On the React-Native side, version 0.73 is in release candidate with a number of DX improvements. There's also interesting activity regarding the possible optimisation of the Text and View components. Canvaskit-js makes it possible to run Skia on the web for just 20kb!

translations.zh-hant: 在 React-Native 方面，0.73 版本已進入發布候選階段，帶來多項開發體驗改進。關於 Text 和 View 元件的性能優化也有有趣進展。Canvaskit-js 讓 Skia 在網頁端僅需 20kb 即可運行！

segments.source_content: There were some interesting announcements at ViteConf last week. Notably a Rust port of Rollup, and the usage of Vite with Remix and React-Native.

translations.zh-hant: 上週 ViteConf 有些重要發布，特別是 Rollup 的 Rust 移植版本，以及 Vite 在 Remix 和 React-Native 中的應用。

## ⚛️ React {#react}
[![Lit React v1.0](/emails/issues/162/lit.jpg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit/react)
[**Lit React v1.0**](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit/react)

segments.source_content: Google's Web Components framework [Lit has just been released in v3.0](https://lit.dev/blog/2023-10-10-lit-3.0/). In addition to improvements to the framework (decorators, template compiler, Preact Signals), there is in particular the `@lit/react` integration package, which has graduated from the Lab, is now stable and in v1.0.

translations.zh-hant: Google 的 Web Components 框架 [Lit 剛發布 v3.0](https://lit.dev/blog/2023-10-10-lit-3.0/)。除框架改進（裝飾器、模板編譯器、Preact Signals）外，重點是 `@lit/react` 整合套件已脫離實驗階段，現穩定發布 v1.0。

segments.source_content: This integration facilitates the use of Web Components in a React app (or Preact) by creating a wrapper that maps React props to the properties of the custom element, manages event handlers and facilitates TypeScript typing. It fills certain gaps in React 18, which does not integrate easily with Web Components: props are mapped to attributes rather than properties. See the [documentation for the React framework](https://lit.dev/docs/frameworks/react/).

translations.zh-hant: 此整合方案透過建立封裝器，將 React 屬性映射到自訂元素的屬性，管理事件處理程序並簡化 TypeScript 類型定義，簡化 Web Components 在 React（或 Preact）應用中的使用。它彌補了 React 18 與 Web Components 整合的不足：屬性會被映射到特性（attributes）而非屬性（properties）。詳見 [React 框架文件](https://lit.dev/docs/frameworks/react/)。

segments.source_content: But can a modern React dev use all this easily? Lit offers experimental packages [@lit-labs/ssr](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr), [@lit-labs/ssr-react](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr-react) and [@lit-labs/nextjs](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/nextjs) but support is limited and won't work with Next.js App Router. The [Declarative Shadow DOM](https://developer.chrome.com/articles/declarative-shadow-dom/), which allows SSR, is not yet implemented in Firefox, but a polyfill exists. In short, Lit should work well on a CRA app, but still feels a bit risky if you need SSR and SEO.

translations.zh-hant: 但現代 React 開發者能輕鬆使用嗎？Lit 提供實驗性套件 [@lit-labs/ssr](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr)、[@lit-labs/ssr-react](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr-react) 和 [@lit-labs/nextjs](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/nextjs)，但支援有限且無法與 Next.js App Router 協作。[宣告式 Shadow DOM](https://developer.chrome.com/articles/declarative-shadow-dom/) 可實現 SSR，但 Firefox 尚未實裝（已有 polyfill）。簡言之，在 CRA 應用中 Lit 運作良好，但若需 SSR 和 SEO 支援則仍有風險。

segments.source_content: [![Using RCTView & RCTText in React Native for Performance Gains](/emails/issues/162/rnperf.jpg)](https://blog.theodo.com/2023/10/native-views-rn-performance/)

translations.zh-hant: [![Using RCTView & RCTText in React Native for Performance Gains](/emails/issues/162/rnperf.jpg)](https://blog.theodo.com/2023/10/native-views-rn-performance/)

segments.source_content: [**Using RCTView & RCTText in React Native for Performance Gains**](https://blog.theodo.com/2023/10/native-views-rn-performance/)

translations.zh-hant: [**透過 RCTView 與 RCTText 提升 React Native 效能**](https://blog.theodo.com/2023/10/native-views-rn-performance/)

segments.source_content: At the moment, React-Native devs are talking a lot [on Twitter](https://twitter.com/FernandoTheRojo/status/1707762822015267219) about the perf of the `Text` and `View` components, which are JS wrappers and add overhead compared to the respective native `RCTText` and `RCTView` elements. William Candillon had already 🎥 [explained this problem](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1D78Tc46Xqo&t=1156s) in 2021, with the possibility of optimising Text rendering. It is possible to optimize as long as you don't need a few features like `onPress` listeners. This article presents a benchmark and measures the impact of using the native components instead of regular components, and reports a gain of around 15%, with variations depending on the platform and architecture.

translations.zh-hant: 近期 React-Native 開發者於 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/FernandoTheRojo/status/1707762822015267219) 熱烈討論 `Text` 和 `View` 元件的效能問題，這些 JS 包裝層相比原生 `RCTText` 和 `RCTView` 元素會產生額外開銷。William Candillon 早在 2021 年已 🎥 [解析此問題](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1D78Tc46Xqo&t=1156s)，提出優化文字渲染的可能性。只要不需要 `onPress` 監聽器等特定功能即可實施優化。本文提供基準測試，量測使用原生元件替代常規元件的影響，結果顯示約有 15% 的效能提升，具體成效依平台與架構而異。

segments.source_content: Now that this trick became mainstream, React-Native devs are keen to take advantage of it. We can note the creation of [react-native-fast-text](https://github.com/peterpme/react-native-fast-text), or the POC of a Babel plugin [react-native-optimizer](https://github.com/marklawlor/react-native-optimizer) which would apply this optimisation automatically.

translations.zh-hant: 隨著此技巧普及，React-Native 開發者積極尋求應用方案。可關注新建立的 [react-native-fast-text](https://github.com/peterpme/react-native-fast-text)，或實驗性 Babel 插件 [react-native-optimizer](https://github.com/marklawlor/react-native-optimizer) 的概念驗證，該插件將自動實施此項優化。
